name: Gunmetal Witch [Battle System]
description:
Gunmetal Witch features a twist on Megaman Battle Network's grid-based battle system, which consists of assembling a repertoire of attacks and abilities, then deploying them in real-time combat.

This build features more than 50 different varieties of Spells to use in fast-paced survival action! Build up a deck of Spells, plan out your combos, and defeat swarms of enemies!

This game is in early development. If you happen to run into bugs, as you likely may, don't hesitate to report them here!

Interested in seeing more? Let me know! I'd love to hear your thoughts and suggestions for this project! Reach out to me at https://twitter.com/devtdcs!

Thank you and have fun!
